official_title: To prohibit export to, and imports from, Yugoslavia until the President certifies to the Congress that the Government of Yugoslavia has recognized the right of each of the Republics of Croatia, Slovenia, Macedonia, Bosnia, and Herzegonia to be an independent state.

summary.text: Prohibits exports of goods and technology to, and imports of products from, Yugoslavia until the President certifies to the Congress that it has recognized the independence of each of its Republics of Croatia, Slovenia, Macedonia, Bosnia, and Herzegovina. Sets forth specified exceptions.

titles.title: To prohibit export to, and imports from, Yugoslavia until the President certifies to the Congress that the Government of Yugoslavia has recognized the right of each of the Republics of Croatia, Slovenia, Macedonia, Bosnia, and Herzegonia to be an independent state.
